sentences.sContent: Lena moved with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.sCn: 莉娜走路姿势有着舞者般的优美。

sentences.sContent: The hotel maintains traditional standards of elegance, style, and grace
sentences.sCn: 这家酒店保持着传统的优雅体面格调。

sentences.sContent: It was only by the grace of God that no one died.
sentences.sCn: 正是承蒙上帝的恩惠才没有人死去。

remMethod.val: 舞蹈演员优雅(grace)地扬起长丝带(brace)

trans.tranCn: 优美；文雅；恩惠,恩泽；感恩祷告
trans.tranOther: a smooth way of moving that looks natural, relaxed, and attractive
